answers.answer: Hello dear and welcome to the medhelp forum.  Do you have any viral infection, rashes or shingles which could cause burning sensation and blisters over the affected side of the face? Diabetes can also cause burning sensation in skin, skin diseases like eczema and psoriaisis, drug reactions to some medications that you might be taking, over exposure to sun and allergic reactions to the cosmetics chemicals are a few possibilities. Consult a physician for evaluation and appropriate management. Wishing you all the best.

question: why does my skin feel like its burning from inside out on left side of my face when i scratch it
title: skin burning from the inside
